parameters.name: Visible
parameters.description: True to show the toolbar, false to hide it

parameters.name: Mask
parameters.description: Context in which to show or hide toolbar as defined in swDocTemplateTypes_e

title: ICommandGroup.SetToolbarVisibility
description: Sets the visibility of the toolbar in the CommandGroup.
signature:
void SetToolbarVisibility( 
   System.Boolean
Visible
,
   System.Int32
Mask
)

parameters.name: Visible
parameters.description: True to show the toolbar, false to hide it

parameters.name: Mask
parameters.description: Context in which to show or hide toolbar as defined in swDocTemplateTypes_e
